name: 黃如瑩
objective:
針對高級班學生強化以英文思考及批判整合之進階英文能力，本課程以(1)報導時事之新聞網(2)經典及流行之英文電影為主要教材，分析及應用進階英文的架構、風格及語言特色。
In this class, we will study (1) current international affairs on news media and (2)  English language films depicting realistic events in order to help advanced non-English major students develop their English language skills and critical thinking. Through discussions, oral presentation, and essay writing, students can put to use of what they have learned from news reports and cinematic narratives.
